languages.text: {n}Снова стихи. Смысл испытания {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}ясен{/d} — чтобы последовать по пути святой, надо прикончить страдающего юнца. Они хотят понять, понимаете ли вы путь тех, кого ищете.{/n}

{n}More verses. The crux of this test is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}clear{/d}: in order to follow in the saint's footsteps, you are supposed to kill the young man and thus release him from his suffering. The cultists want to see if you understand the philosophy of those you seek.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mehr Verse. Das Problem dieser Prüfung ist {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}klar{/d}: Um in die Fußstapfen des Heiligen zu treten, musst du den jungen Mann töten und von seinem Leid befreien. Die Kultisten wollen sehen, ob du die Philosophie der Leute verstehst, die du suchst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More verses. The crux of this test is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}clear{/d}: in order to follow in the saint's footsteps, you are supposed to kill the young man and thus release him from his suffering. The cultists want to see if you understand the philosophy of those you seek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mehr Verse. Das Problem dieser Prüfung ist {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}klar{/d}: Um in die Fußstapfen des Heiligen zu treten, musst du den jungen Mann töten und von seinem Leid befreien. Die Kultisten wollen sehen, ob du die Philosophie der Leute verstehst, die du suchst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'autres versets. Le sens de cette épreuve est {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}clair{/d} : pour suivre les traces du saint, vous devez tuer le jeune homme et le délivrer ainsi de ses souffrances. Les fanatiques veulent s'assurer que vous comprenez la philosophie de ceux que vous cherchez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More verses. The crux of this test is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}clear{/d}: in order to follow in the saint's footsteps, you are supposed to kill the young man and thus release him from his suffering. The cultists want to see if you understand the philosophy of those you seek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'autres versets. Le sens de cette épreuve est {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}clair{/d} : pour suivre les traces du saint, vous devez tuer le jeune homme et le délivrer ainsi de ses souffrances. Les fanatiques veulent s'assurer que vous comprenez la philosophie de ceux que vous cherchez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Más verso. El significado de este texto está {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}claro{/d}: para seguir los pasos del santo, debes matar a este joven para aliviar su sufrimiento. Los cultistas quieren ver si entiendes la filosofía de aquellos a quienes buscas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More verses. The crux of this test is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}clear{/d}: in order to follow in the saint's footsteps, you are supposed to kill the young man and thus release him from his suffering. The cultists want to see if you understand the philosophy of those you seek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Más verso. El significado de este texto está {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}claro{/d}: para seguir los pasos del santo, debes matar a este joven para aliviar su sufrimiento. Los cultistas quieren ver si entiendes la filosofía de aquellos a quienes buscas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}さらに多くの詩がある。この試練の確信は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}明確{/d}だ。聖人の足跡を辿るには、若者を殺してその苦しみから解放してやる必要がある。カルト教団は、あなたが探している者の理念を理解しているかどうかを確かめたがっているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More verses. The crux of this test is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}clear{/d}: in order to follow in the saint's footsteps, you are supposed to kill the young man and thus release him from his suffering. The cultists want to see if you understand the philosophy of those you seek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}さらに多くの詩がある。この試練の確信は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}明確{/d}だ。聖人の足跡を辿るには、若者を殺してその苦しみから解放してやる必要がある。カルト教団は、あなたが探している者の理念を理解しているかどうかを確かめたがっているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}又是新的诗句。这次试炼的要点已经{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}一目了然{/d}了——为了追随圣人的足迹，你应该杀死这位年轻人，让他摆脱痛苦。教派成员想要了解你是否理解你寻找之人的哲学理念。{/n}

The crux of this test is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}clear{/d}: in order to follow in the saint's footsteps, you are supposed to kill the young man and thus release him from his suffering. The cultists want to see if you understand the philosophy of those you seek.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yine mısralar. Bu imtihanın özü {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}belli{/d}: Azizin adımlarından yürüyebilmek için genç adamı öldürüp çektiği acıyı sonlandırmalısın. Tarikatçılar, felsefelerini anlayıp anlamadığını görmek istiyor.{/n}
